selections.name: Bassett's Choice
selections.reason: Comes from the premier Waller stable and gets the services of Andrew Mallyon. While the form figures (rating 53) aren't elite, they are superior to this weak field. The 2nd at Ballina two starts back is the best reference here. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2 to sit closer.

selections.name: Wanna Kiss
selections.reason: Consistent performer who ran a solid 2nd at Gold Coast Poly last start. Has tactical speed and draws the inside, which is crucial with the rail out 12m.

selections.name: Cypher Prince
selections.reason: Third-up today. Form has been poor but drops into a very thin maiden. Can improve.

selections.name: Lady Tangalooma
selections.reason: Gollan/Thompson combination commands respect despite the poor form guide. Could improve drastically in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Wanna Kiss
danger_horse.reason: Consistent placegetter who maps to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Tam Na Ghar
selections.reason: Put in a fantastic effort at this track and distance on Feb 4, finishing 2nd beaten less than a length. Maps perfectly from barrier 4 to stalk the speed. The one to beat.

selections.name: Paper Doll
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran a brave 2nd at Doomben last start. Has the speed to overcome the wider draw.

selections.name: Inside Passage
selections.reason: Resuming for the Kendrick yard. Showed ability last prep with a 2nd at Sunshine Coast. Trialled well.

selections.name: La Gracia
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed first-up before. Barrier is a concern but has ability.

danger_horse.name: Paper Doll
danger_horse.reason: In good form and handles soft tracks well.

selections.name: Mythology
selections.reason: Invader from the Michael Freedman stable in NSW. 3rd at Newcastle and competitive at Kembla Grange. That NSW provincial form is significantly stronger than local maiden form.

selections.name: I Am Louie
selections.reason: Gollan debutant who won a trial at Doomben. Big watch on betting moves.

selections.name: Queen Jeddah
selections.reason: Resuming. Ran a decent 5th at this track in October. Should be matured now.

selections.name: By The Way
selections.reason: Placed at Gold Coast on debut. Open to improvement.

selections.name: Cantarito
selections.reason: Waller runner bringing strong Sydney form (3rd at Warwick Farm). That formline is superior to this Class 1 field. Will appreciate the 1800m.

selections.name: Hot Majesty
selections.reason: Local hope who ran a narrow 2nd at this track/distance last start. Consistent and rates highly (71).

selections.name: Sexy Time
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Hot Majesty last start. Meets that rival on similar terms. Good draw.

selections.name: Possibilities
selections.reason: Another Waller runner. 2nd at this track last start. Must be included.

danger_horse.name: Hot Majesty
danger_horse.reason: Proven at the track and distance recently.

selections.name: Alloutatime
selections.reason: Resuming. Won a Class 6 last preparation with a high rating. Trial winner leading in. The class runner of the field.

selections.name: Provance
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd at this track in a Class 6 last start. Drops back to BM70 here which suits.

selections.name: Air We Go
selections.reason: Won at this track two starts back. Failed at Doomben but can bounce back here.

selections.name: Cindersea
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd at this track last start. Honest.

selections.name: Jenchick Boom
selections.reason: Third-up and ready to peak. Ran a solid 3rd at Doomben in BM68 grade last start. Drops slightly in grade to BM65.

selections.name: Fortuneer
selections.reason: Resuming. Has a good fresh record and trialled well. 3rd in a BM70 before the break reads well for this.

selections.name: Bundella
selections.reason: Gollan runner. 4th at this track in BM65 last start. Drawn well.

selections.name: Meldubious
selections.reason: Won at this track and distance two starts back. Forgive the Doomben failure.

selections.name: Hell To Pay
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at this track in Class 3 company last start. Ratings (82) are top tier for this field. Gollan/McMurray combo.

selections.name: Influential
selections.reason: Just missed (2nd) at Doomben last start. Drawn the rails which is a huge advantage with the rail out 12m.

selections.name: Delrico
selections.reason: Waller runner resuming. Has form around good horses in Sydney. Watch for market support.

selections.name: Ready For The Trip
selections.reason: Resuming. Won 3 from 12. Good fresh record.

selections.name: Detrimental
selections.reason: Ran a great 3rd at this track in BM70 grade last start. Drops to Class 3 here which is a significant easing of grade. Rates highest (80).

selections.name: Kadall
selections.reason: Consistent. 2nd at Doomben in Class 4 last start. Drawn perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: Backstage
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track (Class 1). Steps up in class but clearly loves the Eagle Farm surface.

selections.name: Carpaccio
selections.reason: 2nd at Beaudesert last start. Consistent type who is usually in the money.
